info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 18 at 7:45PM CDT until October 18 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson MS
info.description:
TORJAN
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a
* Tornado Warning for... Central Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana...
* Until 845 PM CDT.
* At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 8 miles northwest of Somerset, or 13 miles southwest of Tallulah, moving northeast at 35 mph.
HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail.
SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation.
IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely.
* This dangerous storm will be near... Tallulah around 755 PM CDT. Mound around 805 PM CDT. Mansford around 810 PM CDT.
Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Richmond.
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.

parameter.value: NWS: TORNADO WARNING in this area til 8:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now. Check media.

National Weather Service: TORNADO WARNING in this area until 8:45 PM CDT. Take shelter now in a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris. Check media.

parameter.value: SNM:AVISO DE TORNADO hasta las 8:45 PM CDT. Refugiese ahora. Consulte medios informativos

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE TORNADO en efecto hasta las 8:45 PM CDT. Busque refugio ahora en un sotano o en el interior de un cuarto en el nivel mas bajo de un edificio seguro. Si esta al aire libre, en una casa movil, o en un vehiculo, debe ir al edificio seguro mas cercano y protegerse de proyectiles. Consulte los medios informativos.
